hydrologistmod:AbstractHydrologistCard.NAME: ABSTRAAAAACT
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: A Shocked enemy deals 25% less damage with and takes 50% more damage from Attacks. Removes Cool and Hot when applied. Applying any Cool or Hot to this enemy will instead deal an equal amount of damage.

hydrologistmod:Aqueducts.NAME: Aqueducts
hydrologistmod:Aqueducts.DESCRIPTION: hydrologistmod:Flow. NL Whenever you draw an extra card, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

hydrologistmod:BranchingCreeks.NAME: Branching Creeks
hydrologistmod:BranchingCreeks.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you hydrologistmod:Transmute a card, choose between !M! additional cards.

hydrologistmod:Cascade.NAME: Cascade
hydrologistmod:Cascade.DESCRIPTION: hydrologistmod:Flow. NL Gain !B! Block for each card discarded this way.

hydrologistmod:Condensation.NAME: Condensation
hydrologistmod:Condensation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If your next card played is a *Water card, draw a card.
hydrologistmod:Condensation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If your next card played is a *Water card, draw 2 cards.

hydrologistmod:CrystalIce.NAME: Crystal Ice
hydrologistmod:CrystalIce.DESCRIPTION: Block is not removed at the start of your turn. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:CrystalLattice.NAME: Crystal Lattice
hydrologistmod:CrystalLattice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL hydrologistmod:Transmute a card in your hand. Fill your hand with copies of the new card. NL Exhaust.

hydrologistmod:Crystallization.NAME: Crystallization
hydrologistmod:Crystallization.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If your next card played is an *Ice card, hydrologistmod:Transmute a card in your hand.

hydrologistmod:DebilitatingExplosion.NAME: Debilitating Explosion
hydrologistmod:DebilitatingExplosion.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
hydrologistmod:DebilitatingExplosion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

hydrologistmod:DeepFreeze.NAME: Deep Freeze
hydrologistmod:DeepFreeze.DESCRIPTION: Your *Ice cards that gain Block gain !M! additional Block. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:DimensionalIcicles.NAME: Dimensional Icicles
hydrologistmod:DimensionalIcicles.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade a hydrologistmod:Corporeal card in your hand for the rest of combat.
hydrologistmod:DimensionalIcicles.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade a hydrologistmod:Corporeal card in your hand for the rest of combat.

hydrologistmod:DryingPond.NAME: Drying Pond
hydrologistmod:DryingPond.DESCRIPTION: Choose any number of cards in your hand to hydrologistmod:Transmute. NL Exhaust. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.
hydrologistmod:DryingPond.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card, then choose any number of cards in your hand to hydrologistmod:Transmute. NL Exhaust. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:EncapsulatingIce.NAME: Encapsulating Ice
hydrologistmod:EncapsulatingIce.DESCRIPTION: Your *Pressure *Blasts this combat are played with X increased by X. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.
hydrologistmod:EncapsulatingIce.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your *Pressure *Blasts this combat are played with X increased by X+1. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:Endothermodynamics.NAME: Endothermodynamics
hydrologistmod:Endothermodynamics.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you hydrologistmod:Transmute a card, gain !M! Block. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:Eruption.NAME: Eruption
hydrologistmod:Eruption.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [E] [E] [E] . NL hydrologistmod:Swaps when played. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:Evaporation.NAME: Evaporation
hydrologistmod:Evaporation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If your next card played is a *Steam card, apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

hydrologistmod:Exothermodynamics.NAME: Exothermodynamics
hydrologistmod:Exothermodynamics.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you hydrologistmod:Transmute a card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:ExtradimensionalIcicles.NAME: Extradimensional Icicles
hydrologistmod:ExtradimensionalIcicles.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade a hydrologistmod:Corporeal card in your hand for the rest of combat.
hydrologistmod:ExtradimensionalIcicles.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade a hydrologistmod:Corporeal card in your hand for the rest of combat.

hydrologistmod:FallingIcicles.NAME: Falling Icicles
hydrologistmod:FallingIcicles.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:FleetingForm.NAME: Fleeting Form
hydrologistmod:FleetingForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a *Steam card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy. NL hydrologistmod:Swaps to *Frigid *Form.

hydrologistmod:FlowingCurrents.NAME: Flowing Currents
hydrologistmod:FlowingCurrents.DESCRIPTION: hydrologistmod:Flow. NL When hydrologistmod:Swapped, you cannot swap away from this card again this turn. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.
hydrologistmod:FlowingCurrents.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card, then hydrologistmod:Flow. NL When hydrologistmod:Swapped, you cannot swap away from this card again this turn. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This card can't be swapped again this turn!

hydrologistmod:FlowingForm.NAME: Flowing Form
hydrologistmod:FlowingForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a *Water card, you may discard a card. If you do, draw !M! cards. NL hydrologistmod:Swaps to *Fleeting *Form.

hydrologistmod:Freeze.NAME: Freeze
hydrologistmod:Freeze.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy that is hydrologistmod:Cool, Upgrade a random card in your deck. NL Exhaust.

hydrologistmod:FrigidForm.NAME: Frigid Form
hydrologistmod:FrigidForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an *Ice card, gain !M! block. NL hydrologistmod:Swaps to *Flowing *Form.

hydrologistmod:FrigidLash.NAME: Frigid Lash
hydrologistmod:FrigidLash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the Block gained by the *Paired card by !M! this combat. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:FrozenCapsule.NAME: Frozen Capsule
hydrologistmod:FrozenCapsule.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL hydrologistmod:Transmute this card. The new card costs 0 this combat.
hydrologistmod:FrozenCapsule.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL hydrologistmod:Transmute this card. The new card costs 0 this combat and is Upgraded.

hydrologistmod:GhostlyMist.NAME: Ghostly Mist
hydrologistmod:GhostlyMist.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you played a hydrologistmod:Corporeal card this turn, deal !D! damage again.

hydrologistmod:GentleSnowfall.NAME: Gentle Snowfall
hydrologistmod:GentleSnowfall.DESCRIPTION: hydrologistmod:Flow. NL If you discard !M! cards this way, gain 1 Intangible.

hydrologistmod:Giraffe.NAME: Giraffe
hydrologistmod:Giraffe.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Retain up to !M! hydrologistmod:Corporeal cards.

hydrologistmod:GlacialStrike.NAME: Glacial Strike
hydrologistmod:GlacialStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is Vulnerable, gain !B! Block. NL If the enemy is Weak, deal an additional !D! damage.

hydrologistmod:GlacialSynthesis.NAME: Glacial Synthesis
hydrologistmod:GlacialSynthesis.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL hydrologistmod:Transmute a card into an Ice card.

hydrologistmod:GlacierBash.NAME: Glacier Bash
hydrologistmod:GlacierBash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When hydrologistmod:Swapped, reduce this card's cost by [E] for this combat. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:Hail.NAME: Hail
hydrologistmod:Hail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the damage of ALL *Ice cards by !M! this combat.

hydrologistmod:Hailstorm.NAME: Hailstorm
hydrologistmod:Hailstorm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you play an *Ice card, the enemy takes !M! damage.

hydrologistmod:HeatAndPressure.NAME: Heat and Pressure
hydrologistmod:HeatAndPressure.DESCRIPTION: Double the enemy's Vulnerable amount. NL Exhaust. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.
hydrologistmod:HeatAndPressure.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Triple the enemy's Vulnerable amount. NL Exhaust. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:HeatBlast.NAME: Heat Blast
hydrologistmod:HeatBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Damage amount is multiplied once for each stack of Vulnerable.
hydrologistmod:HeatBlast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Triple the enemy's Vulnerable amount. NL Exhaust. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:HighPressure.NAME: High Pressure
hydrologistmod:HighPressure.DESCRIPTION: Your *Steam cards that deal damage deal !M! additional damage. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:HighTide.NAME: High Tide
hydrologistmod:HighTide.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL hydrologistmod:Flow. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:HotSprings.NAME: Hot Springs
hydrologistmod:HotSprings.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff to any enemy, remove the same debuff from yourself.
hydrologistmod:HotSprings.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you apply a debuff to any enemy, remove the same debuff from yourself.

hydrologistmod:Hydraulics.NAME: Hydraulics
hydrologistmod:Hydraulics.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, hydrologistmod:Flow.

hydrologistmod:IceBarrier.NAME: Ice Barrier
hydrologistmod:IceBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When hydrologistmod:Transmuted, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

hydrologistmod:IcyFloe.NAME: Icy Floe
hydrologistmod:IcyFloe.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you hydrologistmod:Flow, draw a card for each card discarded.

hydrologistmod:JetPropulsion.NAME: Jet Propulsion
hydrologistmod:JetPropulsion.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. If the enemy does NOT intend to attack, draw !M! cards.

hydrologistmod:LaminarFlow.NAME: Laminar Flow
hydrologistmod:LaminarFlow.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain 3(4) Block. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:LayeredShell.NAME: Layered Shell
hydrologistmod:LayeredShell.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increase the damage dealt by the *Paired card by !M! this combat. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:Liquidation.NAME: Liquidation
hydrologistmod:Liquidation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If your next card played is a *Water card, apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

hydrologistmod:Manifestation.NAME: Manifestation
hydrologistmod:Manifestation.DESCRIPTION: hydrologistmod:Corporeal cards deal !M! additional damage and gain !M! additional Block.

hydrologistmod:PackedSnow.NAME: Packed Snow
hydrologistmod:PackedSnow.DESCRIPTION: The next *Ice, *Water, and *Steam cards you play this combat are played twice. NL Exhaust.

hydrologistmod:PersonalRaincloud.NAME: Personal Raincloud
hydrologistmod:PersonalRaincloud.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card. NL Create a *Raincloud and *Pair it with a card in your hand. NL Exhaust.

hydrologistmod:Pneumatics.NAME: Pneumatics
hydrologistmod:Pneumatics.DESCRIPTION: hydrologistmod:Flow. NL At the start of the next !M! turns, hydrologistmod:Flow. NL Exhaust.

hydrologistmod:PressureBlast.NAME: Pressure Blast
hydrologistmod:PressureBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X (+ !M! ) times. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:PressureBuildup.NAME: Pressure Buildup
hydrologistmod:PressureBuildup.DESCRIPTION: Every time you play 10 hydrologistmod:Corporeal cards, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

hydrologistmod:PureIce.NAME: Pure Ice
hydrologistmod:PureIce.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When hydrologistmod:Transmuted, gain !B! Block twice.

hydrologistmod:PureSteam.NAME: Pure Steam
hydrologistmod:PureSteam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When hydrologistmod:Transmuted, deal !D! damage to a random enemy twice.

hydrologistmod:PureWater.NAME: Pure Water
hydrologistmod:PureWater.DESCRIPTION: hydrologistmod:Flow. NL When hydrologistmod:Transmuted, draw a card, then hydrologistmod:Flow.
hydrologistmod:PureWater.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: hydrologistmod:Flow. NL Draw a card. NL When hydrologistmod:Transmuted, draw a card, then hydrologistmod:Flow.

hydrologistmod:Raincloud.NAME: Raincloud
hydrologistmod:Raincloud.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:ReleaseValve.NAME: Release Valve
hydrologistmod:ReleaseValve.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you hydrologistmod:Flow, the enemy takes !M! damage for each card discarded. NL Exhaust.

hydrologistmod:Reservoir.NAME: Reservoir
hydrologistmod:Reservoir.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Ethereal. NL Costs [E] [E] to hydrologistmod:Swap. NL When hydrologistmod:Swapped, discard this card. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.
hydrologistmod:Reservoir.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Ethereal. NL Costs [E] to hydrologistmod:Swap. NL When hydrologistmod:Swapped, discard this card. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:ResonantCrystal.NAME: Resonant Crystal
hydrologistmod:ResonantCrystal.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you hydrologistmod:Transmute a card, the new card is Upgraded.

hydrologistmod:Ripcurrent.NAME: Ripcurrent
hydrologistmod:Ripcurrent.DESCRIPTION: Double the enemy's Weak amount. NL Exhaust. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.
hydrologistmod:Ripcurrent.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double the enemy's Weak amount. NL Exhaust. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:RiverOfTime.NAME: River Of Time
hydrologistmod:RiverOfTime.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next hydrologistmod:Swappable card is also played *Swapped.
hydrologistmod:RiverOfTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next 2 hydrologistmod:Swappable cards are also played *Swapped.

hydrologistmod:Sauna.NAME: Sauna
hydrologistmod:Sauna.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for every hydrologistmod:Corporeal card in your hand.

hydrologistmod:ScaldingGeyser.NAME: Scalding Geyser
hydrologistmod:ScaldingGeyser.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

hydrologistmod:SeaFoam.NAME: Sea Foam
hydrologistmod:SeaFoam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL hydrologistmod:Transmute a card in your hand. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:SoggySynthesis.NAME: Soggy Synthesis
hydrologistmod:SoggySynthesis.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL hydrologistmod:Transmute a card into a *Water card.

hydrologistmod:Solidification.NAME: Solidification
hydrologistmod:Solidification.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If your next card played is an *Ice card, gain !M! Block.

hydrologistmod:SoothingWater.NAME: Soothing Water
hydrologistmod:SoothingWater.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Fleeting. NL When hydrologistmod:Swapped, permanently increase this card's healing by 4 and Exhaust. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.
hydrologistmod:SoothingWater.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Fleeting. NL When hydrologistmod:Swapped, permanently increase this card's healing by 6 and Exhaust. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:SteamEngine.NAME: Steam Engine
hydrologistmod:SteamEngine.DESCRIPTION: The first hydrologistmod:Corporeal card you play each turn is played twice.
hydrologistmod:SteamEngine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL The first hydrologistmod:Corporeal card you play each turn is played twice.

hydrologistmod:SteamLash.NAME: Steam Lash
hydrologistmod:SteamLash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable. NL When hydrologistmod:Swapped, gain [E].

hydrologistmod:SteamPower.NAME: Steam Power
hydrologistmod:SteamPower.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When hydrologistmod:Transmuted, draw !M! cards.

hydrologistmod:Sublimation.NAME: Sublimation
hydrologistmod:Sublimation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If your next card played is a *Steam card, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

hydrologistmod:SwelteringSynthesis.NAME: Sweltering Synthesis
hydrologistmod:SwelteringSynthesis.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL hydrologistmod:Transmute a card into a *Steam card.

hydrologistmod:TidalWave.NAME: Tidal Wave
hydrologistmod:TidalWave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:Transfusion.NAME: Transfusion
hydrologistmod:Transfusion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy that is Vulnerable, raise your Max HP by !M!. NL Exhaust.

hydrologistmod:Upstream.NAME: Upstream
hydrologistmod:Upstream.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block.

hydrologistmod:WallOfIce.NAME: Wall of Ice
hydrologistmod:WallOfIce.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:WaterTurbine.NAME: Water Turbine
hydrologistmod:WaterTurbine.DESCRIPTION: hydrologistmod:Flow. NL Next turn, gain [E] equal to the number of cards discarded this way. NL Exhaust.

hydrologistmod:WaterWheel.NAME: Water Wheel
hydrologistmod:WaterWheel.DESCRIPTION: hydrologistmod:Flow. NL At the start of next turn, gain X [E] . NL Exhaust.
hydrologistmod:WaterWheel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: hydrologistmod:Flow. NL At the start of next turn, gain X [E] .

hydrologistmod:WaterWhip.NAME: Water Whip
hydrologistmod:WaterWhip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable. NL Costs [E] to hydrologistmod:Swap.

hydrologistmod:YawningAbyss.NAME: Yawning Abyss
hydrologistmod:YawningAbyss.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage an additional time for each stack of Weak on the enemy. NL Apply !M! Weak.
